item.description:
Let's get together for a game of Stump Trivia! I've missed hosting these and decided it was definitely time to bring it back ! It's a LOT of fun!

We'll meetup at 6:45 , get a table(s), have drinks , appetizers, or dinner.

Depending on the amount of RSVP, we will need to form teams as Trivia begins at 8:00 pm

You don't need to be a Brainiac to play this game. But, f you aren't up for playing, join us anyway ! You can be there to cheer us on!

I'm not sure if they still offer a cash prize, but will inquire.

THE OLD COURT PUB:

Located at the corner of Central and Middle Streets in historic downtown Lowell, The
Old Court is Lowell’s premiere, authentic Irish pub and restaurant. Since they opened in February, 2001, the pub has become an integral part of Lowell’s bustling dining and entertainment scene while also retaining it's unique Irish identity.

ww.oldcourtirishpub.com

If for some reason you are unable to find us, you can reach me @ 978.289.7679 after 6:30 PM

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: TRIVIA Night @ The Old Court Pub ( Lowell)
